channel.title: Posts on Lucinda's tests
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Lucinda's tests

item.title: Diabetic Foot
item.description: Question 1 A 60 year old man is referred to the diabetic clinic. He has a history of poorly controlled T2DM and has developed a small ulcer within a callus on the plantar aspect of his foot, over the first metatarsal head. The gentleman reports no pain. .quiz fieldset { border-color: black; border-width: 5px; margin-bottom: 1em; } .quiz legend { font-size: 1.3rem; font-weight: bold; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 20px; } .

item.title: Examination
item.description: Question 1 Which changes may you see with arterial disease? .quiz fieldset { border-color: black; border-width: 5px; margin-bottom: 1em; } .quiz legend { font-size: 1.3rem; font-weight: bold; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 20px; } .quiz .hint { border: 2px solid gray; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; font-size:1.25rem; font-weight: bold; } .quiz label { display: block; font-size:1.25rem; line-height: 1.75em; } .quiz input[type="radio"] { margin-right: 10px; page-break-after: avoid; page-break-before: avoid; } .

item.title: Vascular History
item.description: Question 1 What symptoms would you expect someone with arterial disease to describe? .quiz fieldset { border-color: black; border-width: 5px; margin-bottom: 1em; } .quiz legend { font-size: 1.3rem; font-weight: bold; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 20px; } .quiz .hint { border: 2px solid gray; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; font-size:1.25rem; font-weight: bold; } .quiz label { display: block; font-size:1.25rem; line-height: 1.75em; } .quiz input[type="radio"] { margin-right: 10px; page-break-after: avoid; page-break-before: avoid; } .
